attributes.action: ensure that BT keep's all Red K6 Phoneboxes yet to be removed, whilst retaining the coin service and telephony
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BT has been removing the Iconic Red K6 Phonebox's across the UK since the early 80's, and replaced many with the modern Glass and Aluminium versions. Unfortunately, BT is running a program to remove ALL phoneboxes that they deem to be unprofitable, whether they are the aluminium, or the iconic Red K6 Phonebox. 

A certain sign of a phonebox on the final list to be removed is the loss of the coin operated phone service. These are a vital emergency call point, even if they are used less than once a year. They are also a part of the landscape in many areas, and are a symbol of the once proud United Kingdom.
